name: DeathMarkers
description: Online death collection for creators and players

share-deaths.name: Share my deaths
share-deaths.description: Contributes to the ecosystem of level creators trying to gain insight on their gameplay. Your deaths remain anonymous. Visit the GitHub for more information.

always-show.name: Always show Markers in-game
always-show.description: Draws Markers in-game even while playing normally. May impede visibility and performance. You should not normally use this. This overrides the "Draw in practice" and "Only on New Best" settings.

prog-bar-hist-height.name: Death histogram height
prog-bar-hist-height.description: Draws a Graph of the distribution of deaths by percentage beneath the progress bar upon death. 0 to disable

marker-scale.name: Marker Scale
marker-scale.description: Determines the scale of the markers, 0 to disable.

draw-in-practice.name: Markers in Practice
draw-in-practice.description: Whether to draw death markers in Practice Mode and Testmode.

stacks-in-editor.name: Marker Stacks in Editor
stacks-in-editor.description: Whether to mark groups of death markers in close proximity with a special indicator. Causes lag with large amounts of markers in a level, but disambiguates deaths laying at the exact same coordiantes.

darken-editor.name: Darkener in Editor
darken-editor.description: How much the level should be darkened in the editor when markers are being shown. 0 = Full brightness, 255 = Blackout (not recommended)

newbest-only.name: Show Markers only on New Best
newbest-only.description: Whether to show death markers only when you achieve a new best percentage. Ignored in Platformer mode
